content: introducing the striped bucket hat pattern by carroway crochet the striped bucket hat is perfect for summer days it is a top down hat using the single_crochet stitch the pattern is written for a teen or adult size the striped bucket hat is inspired by the bucket hats of the 80s and 90s they have made a huge comeback and are so popular right now you can make your bucket hat with your choice of worsted weight yarn either acrylic or cotton just look for the number 4 on the yarn label it is a beginner crochet pattern with easy to follow instructions it is in us terms
